entry.title: Not The Picture Perfect Figure I Thought You'd Be
entry.summary:
Author: Nikiclix

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,708Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 1,165

Summary: The batfamily gets into a fight and gets hit by a spell that drops them to the past where Bruce is six years old. They meet Bruce's parents but Thomas wasn't what they thought he'd be like from the stories Bruce told them. Ft. Emotionally repressed b who loves his kids deeply but can't seem to tell them that   ————— OR That time travel story on Tumblr   Written for Whumptober day 26 "Nothing like a relapse to rehash the kid who was scared."   Ps: please give this a chance i swear it's better than it seems TT

entry.title: Why The Robins Came Home
entry.summary:
Author: Smarty2604

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,149Chapters: 2/20Kudos: 21

Summary: Dick shows up with twins and a letter that changes everything. Jason comes home with a daughter and a heartbreak he can't fix, no matter how hard he tried. Damian returns without warning, carrying two sons—more responsibility than he’s ever known, and the certainty that he has no room left for pride. And Tim—Tim's world has shattered in a way that he doesn't know if he'll come back from. But he has to. For his son. Two weeks doesn’t sound like long—until you’re raising a baby alone. One by one, the Robins come home carrying infants, exhaustion, and a grief that refuses to wait for you to be ready. The kind that doesn't care how strong you are. What they find isn’t a mission or a mantle—but a family learning how to stand still long enough to heal. Bruce Wayne expects a productive day at the Batcomputer.Instead, he gets his sons back in a single heartbreaking evening. This is where the legacy begins.This is why the Robins came home.

entry.title: the eigth wonder of the world (you)
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,558Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 1,102

Summary: Bruce Wayne meets Clark Kent, who he knows is Superman, and decides to mess with him as a way to see how long it will take him to piece together that the billionarie airhead playboy from Gotham is, in fact, the Knight of Darkness; Batman. If he's going to reveal himself, he's gonna have some fun first. Meanwhile, Superman, Clark Kent, Kal-El, whatever have you is very confused. Bruce Wayne is coming onto him whether he's in suit or not, and... he can't possibly know, right? But Batman is stoic as every, even if he is convincing him to, "Give it a try, Kal. If the date goes bad, freeze him." The Justice League gets convinced that Batman is dating someone in Gotham (when he really wants to date the Man of Steel), unaware he's calling home to his... however many kids that the man actually has. Shenanagins, introductions of all Robins and Gotahm vigilantes enuse, Green Lantern swears he sees Batman smile, but nobody believes him, and Clark falls deeper in love with both of Bruce Wayne's sides, and even the little hidden part he keeps to himself, too. He can't believe this is happeneing to him.

entry.title: Hey Brother
entry.summary:
Author: theasexuwhalestuff

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 998Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 58

Summary: They've all seen the footage now. They know what Bruce did to Dick — for years. Tim uncovered it. Steph can't look at Bruce. Cass won't speak to him. And Jason makes sure Bruce understands that touching Dick ever again will be the last thing he does. The thing about Jason Todd: he's always been best at protecting his big brother.

entry.summary:
Author: Eznin

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,795Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 330

entry.title: I will find you, whenever you are
entry.summary:
Author: Florchus

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,969Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 42

Summary: One mistake. One device. Four Robins lost in time. Dick, Jason, Tim, and Damian are scattered across time. Separated from each other, and from the present, they must survive unfamiliar eras, unravel what happened, and find a way home. Meanwhile, Bruce Wayne is left behind with an empty Batcave and one impossible question: where did his sons go?

entry.title: Lights! Cameras! And ACTION!
entry.summary:
Author: Fishwithabow

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,354Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 37

Summary: You are Bruce’s Wayne only BLOOD daughter. He adopted you when you were nine following your mother’s sudden death. Your mother used to be a well known actor and so of course, like mother like daughter, you too wanted to be an actor. Your father and your new siblings for some reason tend to forget about you and end up leaving you in their dust. Will that ever change? Will you become famous before they ever notice you? Or will something happen that will change your whole view of your life?

entry.title: Talk 'Till There's No Lies
entry.summary:
Author: Skeletons_InYourCloset

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,343Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 58

Summary: For the record, Hal would like to say this was not his fault. After all, that girl was really hot—think of a desert storm wrapped in a human form, with hair like dust devils swirling in the sunset and a smile that could make a monk rethink his vows—and that's what he was up against. Anyone would’ve been distracted, okay? Superman would've taken a little longer to blink. Batman would’ve pretended he wasn’t affected, then brooded about it for six months. And Hal? Hal forgot where he was and long story short—she kissed him. When he pulled back, dazed and grinning like an idiot, his ring was gone. Next thing he knew, he was waking up—hands cuffed, ring still absent, ego thoroughly bruised. Now, it wasn’t like this was Hal’s first time getting kidnapped. Far from it. But this? This was a first. No alien warlords. No cosmic entities. Just… a woman hired to lure him in for some wacko wanting to get dirt on, here's the kicker, Spooky of all people. Crazy, right? Or, Hal gets kidnapped by your average Gotham crazy wanting to get a step ahead of Batman and ends up being saved like a damsel in distress. Bruce is, surprisingly, overprotective—bordering on solicitous—about the whole thing.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 171,871Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 322

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: Family Mayhem Detour
entry.summary:
Author: ValorusPrime

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,967Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Months after the body swap that almost tore two worlds apart, things are finally… normal-ish. The dimensional bridge is sealed, the mirror monster is unmade, and both universes are quietly pretending nothing that weird ever happened. Bruce Wayne has three new kids in his already overstuffed manor, Aizawa Shouta has three extra gremlins orbiting Class 1-A, and everyone agrees on one rule: no more doors between worlds. Then the Shie Hassaikai raid goes sideways. When Eri’s unstable quirk collides with leftover dimensional scars, Aizawa, Midoriya, and Eri are ripped out of Musutafu and dropped into the middle of a Central City bank robbery… right between the Flash and his Rogues. With Class 1-A babysitting Shouta’s kids in Japan, the Batfamily folding three shell-shocked new Waynes into their chaos, and a yakuza-backed quirk-erasing conspiracy still brewing back home, Bruce and Aizawa have to find a way to reconnect across a closed multiverse—without ripping reality open again. Less eldritch horror this time. More exhausted dads, too many children, Central City shenanigans, and the stubborn, ridiculous determination to bring everyone home in one piece.

entry.title: Gotham’s personal devil.
entry.summary:
Author: Agentph03n1x

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,289Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 572

Summary: The day started off like any usual day in the hotel, ghosts huddled around the TV chatting obnoxiously loud, Ester practicing her dark magic, Ben trying to boost his ego and failing in doing so, Nathan trying to work the front desk but scaring off potential customers when his hand goes through keys instead of grabbing them. The same old normal they have become so used to after living in the hotel for so long. However, Abaddon had bigger plans in mind today, yes today on this faithful day, Abaddon was finally going to capture the Moth-man, his arch nemesis since the dawn of time.

entry.title: Batman: Hellish Rebuke
entry.summary:
Author: ZyiedZneidi

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,128Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 1

Summary: When the Seven Deadly Sins manifest as ancient entities with modern faces, they descend upon Gotham to corrupt it from within and ignite Armageddon from its streets.Wrath ignites righteous fury in the forgotten.Greed preaches the gospel of self-interest with chilling honesty.Lust offers paradise no one wants to leave.Envy steals faces and trust.Sloth drowns will in apathy.Gluttony consumes hope and ambition.Pride demands worship from a broken city.At the center stands Ma’moun Oghlou — the Devil’s Advocate, the Philosopher-King of Greed — who sees Batman not as an enemy, but as the ultimate prize to convert.Bruce Wayne must confront not just the demons outside, but the sins he's carried since Crime Alley. To win, he may have to become the devil at the table... or sacrifice something he can never reclaim.A dark, philosophical Elseworlds horror where Gotham is the battlefield, and the real war is for the soul.

entry.title: Chapter 3; Twilight
entry.summary:
Author: Corvix_Ailuranthrope_4313

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,751Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Safeguard 27 had been a success, The Second Bruce Batman had protected Gotham with everything he had, but nothing lasts forever, including the age of The Second Batman. Now we enter The Twilight of the City. A calm has started to spread over The City, but will it last? Or is something lurking in the dark? Whatever it is, Batman will find it and like the Batmen before him, he will give everything for his City.
